document.docAuthor: Král, David, Jákl, Stanislav, Lu, Yuanyuan & Bai, Ming
document.masterDocTitle: The genus Ceratophyus Fischer von Waldheim, 1824 (Coleoptera: Geotrupidae) in China, along with description of a new species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The genus Ceratophyus Fischer von Waldheim, 1824 (Coleoptera: Geotrupidae) in China, along with description of a new species

subSubSection.paragraph:
Ceratophyus sinicus Zunino, 1973
[中华角粪金龟]

Ceratophyus sinicus Zunino, 1973: 17
, figs 4, 5, 6B (original description); Medvedev & Nikolajev 1974: 121 (distribution, key); Hillert & Král 2013: 183 (distribution).

Material examined ( 76 specimens ).
China , Gansu
:
1 ♂ ( NMPC ), Heshui ,
1.v.1996
;

Additional material examined.
Mongolia , Dornogovi : 1 ♂ , 2 ♀♀ ( NMPC )
,
1 ♂ ( JSCP ), Zaamyn Uud—rail- way station,
5.viii.1990
, at light, D. Král & V. Kubáň lgt
.

Note. The species
Ceratophyus polyceros
is recorded in “The fauna of the beetles from Ningxia , China ” (
Ren et al . 2019
). From the material recorded in this monograph we have examined the following specimens deposited in HBUM: two specimens from Yanchi ( Ningxia ), one specimen from Mahuang Shan, Yanchi ( Ningxia ), and five specimens from Taole ( Ningxia ). These specimens clearly belong to the species
C. sinicus
. Only one specimen from Pengyang ( Ningxia ) has not been found, but from the zoogeographical point of view it should be
C. sinicus
also.
